column4: well, that was pretty funny. I "switched to another VC" and couldn't get back to whatever it is that this is. so I had to hit the reset button. again.
how does "switching to another VC" help me get out of my system freezing?
I'm not even sure what could have possible have frozen my computer... I'm pretty sure I only had FireFox running.
firefox can be quite the resource hog
